con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://research.sun.com/wadl/2006/10" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <grammars> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org" xmlns:tns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <xs:element name="base-calendar" type="tns:baseCalendarDTO"/> <xs:element name="instance-constraint-violations-list" type="tns:instanceConstraintViolationsListDTO"/> <xs:element name="internal-error" type="tns:internalErrorDTO"/> <xs:element name="machine" type="tns:machineDTO"/> <xs:element name="resource-list" type="tns:resourceListDTO"/> <xs:element name="worker" type="tns:workerDTO"/> <xs:complexType name="resourceListDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"> <xs:element ref="tns:worker"/> <xs:element ref="tns:machine"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="workerDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:resourceDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="first-name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="surname" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="nif" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="resourceDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="calendar" type="tns:resourceCalendarDTO"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="criterion-satisfaction-list"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="criterion-satisfaction" type="tns:criterionSatisfactionDTO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="resources-cost-category-assignment-list"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="resources-cost-category-assignment" type="tns:resourcesCostCategoryAssignmentDTO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="code" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="resourceCalendarDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:baseCalendarDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="calendar-availability-list"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="calendar-availability" type="tns:calendarAvailabilityDTO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="capacity" type="xs:int"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="baseCalendarDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="calendar-exception-list"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="calendar-exception" type="tns:calendarExceptionDTO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="calendar-data-list"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="calendar-data" type="tns:calendarDataDTO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="parent" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="calendarAvailabilityDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="startDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:attribute name="endDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="calendarExceptionDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="date" type="xs:anySimpleType"/> <xs:attribute name="hours" type="xs:int"/> <xs:attribute name="calendar-exception-type-code" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="calendarDataDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="hours-per-day-list"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="hours-per-day" type="tns:hoursPerDayDTO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="expiring-date" type="xs:anySimpleType"/> <xs:attribute name="parent-calendar" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="hoursPerDayDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="day" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="hours" type="xs:int"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="criterionSatisfactionDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="criterion-type-name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="criterion-name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="start-date" type="xs:date"/> <xs:attribute name="end-date" type="xs:date"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="resourcesCostCategoryAssignmentDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="cost-category-name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="start-date" type="xs:date"/> <xs:attribute name="end-date" type="xs:date"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="machineDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:resourceDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="description" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="instanceConstraintViolationsListDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="instance-constraint-violations" type="tns:instanceConstraintViolationsDTO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="instanceConstraintViolationsDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="constraint-violation" type="tns:constraintViolationDTO"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="recoverable-error" type="tns:recoverableErrorDTO"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="tns:internal-error"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="instance-id" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="num-item" type="xs:long"/> <xs:attribute name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="entity-type" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="constraintViolationDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="field-name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="recoverableErrorDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="property" type="tns:propertyDTO"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="error-code" type="xs:int" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="propertyDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="value" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="internalErrorDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="stack-trace" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </grammars> <resources base="http://localhost:8180/libreplan/ws/rest/"> <resource path="/resources/"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> </response> </method> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> </response> </method> <resource path="/{code}/"> <param name="code" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resource> </resources> </application>

type="tns:internalErrorDTO"/> <xs:complexType name="instanceConstraintViolationsListDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="instance-constraint-violations" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="constraintViolationDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="field-name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="message" type="xs:string"/> type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="value" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="internalErrorDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="stack-trace" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="baseCalendarListDTO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" ref="tns:base-calendar"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="baseCalendarDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="calendar-data-list"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="calendar-data" type="tns:calendarDataDTO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="parent" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="code" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="calendarExceptionDTO"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:integrationEntityDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="date" type="xs:anySimpleType"/> <xs:attribute name="hours" type="xs:int"/> <xs:attribute name="calendar-exception-type-code" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="calendarDataDTO"> <xs:complexContent> name="parent-calendar" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="hoursPerDayDTO"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="day" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="hours" type="xs:int"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </grammars> <resources base="http://localhost:8180/libreplan/ws/rest/"> <resource path="/calendars/"> <method name="GET">
